name: underarc_bot
description: Arcy is a general helper for underarc :D

scripts.compile_register: tsc -t es2021 -m esnext --moduleResolution Bundler --outDir dist src/ts/register.ts
scripts.compile_update_kv: tsc -t es2021 -m esnext --moduleResolution Bundler --outDir dist src/ts/update_kv.ts
scripts.register: npm run compile_register && npm run run_register
scripts.update_kv: npm run compile_update_kv && npm run run_update_kv
